entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: `UnsafeAccessorTypeAttribute` for static or private type access #90081
    9.0.0
  • dotnet is not able to run programs compiled with csc #90080
  • Deadlock between debugger and class loading in PGO #90079
  • Optimize `~VectorXXX<T>` with `vpternlogd` #90075
    Future
  • Activity Tracking option for logger factory works differently for tags and baggage #90071
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.CompositeChangeToken may induce deadlocks #43438
    8.0.0
  • `UnsafeAccessor` and static classes #90048
  • TimeProvider GetLocalNow enhancement #90060
    Future
  • execvp:ing freezes debugger #90076
  • `UnsafeAccessor` and structs with no parameterless constructor #90038
  • area-ILVerification and area-Tools-ILVerification #89693
  • Regressions in Exceptions.Handling #84308
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid string allocation and improve performance of `JsonProperty.WriteTo` #90074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix CompositeChangeToken & CancellationTokenSource deadlock #90078
    area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • TimeProvider GetLocalNow enhancement #90066
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Fix an assert and clean up a codegen issue #90067
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Capture EE API exceptions in getNewHelper, and simplify the API shape a bit #89852
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add note about creating arrays using newobj #90070
    area-Meta
  • Rename area-ILVerification to area-Tools-ILVerification #89698
    area-Meta
  • [RISCV] Store 2*XLEN ValueType half in Reg and half on stack when only A7 available #90072
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix mono's Wsingle-bit-bitfield-constant-conversion #90068
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Recover some lost EH performance on Unix amd64 #90033
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Inconsistent DebuggerDisplay formatting - Fix space, equal for name/value and Indirect Value #89370
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • make sure to only enable changes meant for DATAS when it's on #90008
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve config binding gen parsing & make generation specs incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Make casting logic closer to CoreCLR #89548
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2237225 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add g_GCShadowEnd to JIT_WriteBarrier_Table #90036
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Use g_strcasecmp () to check whenever aot input assemblie… #90065
    area-VM-meta-mono
